name: Chaos Village
description: Chaos Village is a top-down chaotic shooter game with various weapons, perks and power ups.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
